INTERNATIONAL STANDARD ISO/IEC/IEEE 12207:2017(E) Systems and software engineering — Software life cycle processes 1 Scope 1.1 Overview This document establishes a common framework for software life cycle processes, with well‐defined terminology, that can be referenced by the software industry.
